headline: Big Banks, Netflix, Pepsico, GE Aerospace: Earnings this week
summary: A fresh earnings season is kicking off this coming week, with Big Banks leading the way on Tuesday and Wednesday. Asking for a Trend host Josh Lipton goes over the top earnings reports to look for, starting Tuesday, July 15. On Tuesday, JPMorgan (JPM), Wells Fargo (WFC), and Citigroup (C) are reporting earnings. On Wednesday, Bank of America (BAC), Morgan Stanley (MS), and Goldman Sachs (GS) will release their reports. Banks are expected to overall report trading revenue gains. On Thursday, Netflix (NFLX), GE Aerospace (GE), and Pepsico (PEP) will be publishing their results. Netflix's second quarter earnings will be out after the markets close, following overall outperformance this year despite some slowing momentum. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here.

headline: Superyachts Are a Big Business. How the Money Works.
summary: Lisa Verbit has financed loans for wealthy clients to buy elite boats for more than 35 years. She tells Barron’s about the changes she’s seen in her business.

headline: Truist Increases PT on Bank of America to $53, Maintains Buy Rating On the Stock
